channel.title: Events on Fore Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Events on Fore Documentation

item.title: Events
item.description: Events Fore is an event-driven state-engine. It reacts to events and dispatches itself events to reflect it’s state. Each operation in Fore is triggered by some event. You can hook your functionality into the page by defining actions for a given event. Lifecycle Events Lifecylce events can be used for initialization tasks. When Fore is loaded into the DOM of a web page it will dispatch the following sequence of events:
